mapper.select: SELECT media_order AS mediaOrder ,media_title AS mediaTitle ,thumbnail_img_nm AS thumbnailImgNm ,thumbnail_origin_file_nm AS thumbnailOriginFileNm ,thumbnail_img_file_path AS thumbnailImgFilePath ,media_price AS mediaPrice ,media_submit_status AS mediaSubmitStatus ,modify_dt AS modifyDt FROM adgomin_media_register WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email} AND media_submit_status in ('T', 'I', 'C', 'Y') ORDER BY media_order DESC

SELECT media_order as mediaOrder ,ad_detail_category as adDetailCategory ,media_title as mediaTitle ,media_summary as mediaSummary ,media_detail_explain as mediaDetailExplain ,thumbnail_img_nm as thumbnailImgNm ,thumbnail_origin_file_nm as thumbnailOriginFileNm ,thumbnail_img_file_path as thumbnailImgFilePath ,media_price as mediaPrice ,media_submit_status as mediaSubmitStatus FROM adgomin_media_register WHERE 1=1 AND media_order = #{mediaOrder}
